Tests.First Test: v. | England at Lancaster Park, Christchurch; 10-13 January 1930
Tests.Last Test: v. | England at Headingley, Leeds; 23-27 June 2022

One Day Internationals.First ODI: v. | Pakistan at Lancaster Park, Christchurch; 11 February 1973
One Day Internationals.Last ODI: v. | Ireland at The Village, Malahide; 12 July 2022

Twenty20 Internationals.First T20I: v. | Australia at Eden Park, Auckland; 17 February 2005
Twenty20 Internationals.Last T20I: v. | India at Eden Gardens, Kolkata; 21 November 2021
